lexUnit.name: eyelid.n
lexUnit.definition: COD: each of the upper and lower folds of skin which cover the eye when closed.

sentence.text: freezing the long-closed eyelids of Romans .
An all-nighter was a triumph of will and my eyelids were already dropping , but I kept my eyes on the thin figure .
Her eyelids were closing against the sheer enormity of the prospect .
The flare on the other side of his eyelids informed him everything was working normally .

The pauses had lengthened and Swod 's eyelids drooped more and more frequently , due to fatigue , boredom or perhaps just the sunshine breaking through the clouds and sending the odd flash through the window .
Emma 's long-lashed eyelids blinked rapidly , her mouth opened and shut twice before she said , ` Mother never did . "
SHe wheezed , hir eyelids fluttering , blood spilling from hir working lips .
She was speaking blindly into the mirror , concentrating on smudging violet shadows onto her closed and bulging eyelids .
He also had unusually heavy , drooping eyelids which could make him look comic or sinister , benevolent or supercilious .
of batting your eyelids at him you
Tom did n't bat an eyelid at the warm fog .
It trained its beams on my eyelids with all the casual cruelty of a schoolkid playing with a compact mirror .
She smiled and she lifted her eyelids at a man in a way that conveyed how attractive and interesting he was .
Stop eyeshadow from gathering in the creases of your eyelids by powdering the lids first and using a waterproof eye-shadow .
She looked weird with one green eyelid and one veined pink .
He was kissing her now with a delicate urgency , her cheeks and temples , her closed eyelids and long , slender throat .
I 'd blacked my eyebrows till they were like tarmac , I 'd put raspberry-coloured gloss thick on my lips and I 'd done my eyelids in a limey shade of green .
I glanced involuntarily at Daffodil , but if there had been a flicker of her eyelids , I had missed it .
The enormous woman kept grinning at him like a shark ; the fat man had eyelids so heavy that Alan could never be sure if he was watching or asleep .
